rooms.description: The entrance hall leads into the villa with Art Deco styling and Vastu-compliant alignment. It has decorative elements inspired by geometric patterns.
Spacious living room with bold Art Deco decor and ample natural light from the south-east to respect Vastu principles for wealth and energy flow.
The dining area is adjacent to the living room, offering a cohesive design with geometric patterns typical of Art Deco style.
A functional kitchen designed for ease and efficiency. It follows Vastu principles by being located in the southeast corner to promote prosperity.
The master bedroom is placed on the north-west side as per Vastu for tranquility and restful energy. It features Art Deco accents with elegant lighting.
A guest bedroom located near the master suite to ensure privacy while maintaining connectivity.
Bathroom for convenience; placed in a non-critical Vastu direction.
A dedicated library with ample shelving and seating, designed to promote learning. Placed in the northeast section as per Vastu guidelines for knowledge.
Servants' quarters are discreetly located towards the rear of the villa ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.details: A large main entrance door on the south side, aligned with Vastu principles for welcoming positive energy.
Large windows on the east side ensure natural light and maintain a connection with nature in line with Art Deco aesthetics.

rooms.description: A spacious terrace area for relaxation and gatherings, featuring Art Deco decorative elements and a view of the surroundings.
